title: P2XL - Android 11 - Camera sometimes ignore zoom
content:
Hi all,

Since Android 11, my camera is sometimes behaving weird. I need to reboot the phone to restore the feature but it fails a few days after.

When I zoom in the camera, all is good. When I take the picture, the zoom is ignored and a unzoomed picture is taken instead.

Is this something known? I haven't found anything yet about this issue.

Thank you.
